docs.lead_paragraph: As an iron fist has unclenched in Burma, we have extended our hand. PRESIDENT OBAMA, announcing the lifting of most prohibitions on Americans' doing business in Myanmar (formerly Burma). [A4]
docs.snippet: As an iron fist has unclenched in Burma, we have extended our hand.     PRESIDENT OBAMA, announcing the lifting of most prohibitions on Americans' doing business in Myanmar (formerly Burma). [A4]...

docs.lead_paragraph: Today, I can report that, as promised, the rest of our troops in Iraq will come home by the end of the year. PRESIDENT OBAMA
docs.snippet: Today, I can report that, as promised, the rest of our troops in Iraq will come home by the end of the year.     PRESIDENT OBAMA...

docs.lead_paragraph: There's no quick fix for this recession. The hard truth is that it took years to create our current economic problems, and it will take more time than any of us would like to repair the damage. PRESIDENT OBAMA, [A3]
docs.snippet: There's no quick fix for this recession. The hard truth is that it took years to create our current economic problems, and it will take more time than any of us would like to repair the damage.  PRESIDENT OBAMA,  [A3]...

docs.lead_paragraph: A systemic failure has occurred, and I consider that totally unacceptable. PRESIDENT OBAMA, on security lapses before the attempted Christmas Day bombing of a passenger jet over Detroit. [A1]
docs.snippet: A systemic failure has occurred, and I consider that totally unacceptable.     PRESIDENT OBAMA,  on security lapses before the attempted Christmas Day  bombing of a passenger jet  over Detroit. [A1]...

docs.lead_paragraph: I've got to own up to my mistake, which is that ultimately it's important for this administration to send a message that there aren't two sets of rules. You know, one for prominent people and one for ordinary folks who have to pay their taxes. President Obama [A1]
docs.snippet: I've got to own up to my mistake, which is that ultimately it's important for this administration to send a message that there aren't two sets of rules. You know, one for prominent people and one for ordinary folks who have to pay their taxes.    ...

docs.lead_paragraph: I can tell you that if it was me, I would resign. Because public service is exactly that, it's a service to the public. PRESIDENT OBAMA, on Representative Anthony D. Weiner. [A17]
docs.snippet: I can tell you that if it was me, I would resign. Because public service is exactly that, it's a service to the public.     PRESIDENT OBAMA, on Representative Anthony D. Weiner. [A17]...

docs.lead_paragraph: There's nothing courageous about asking for sacrifice from those who can least afford it and don't have any clout on Capitol Hill. PRESIDENT OBAMA. [A1]
docs.snippet: There's nothing courageous about asking for sacrifice from those who can least afford it and don't have any clout on Capitol Hill.      PRESIDENT OBAMA. [A1]...

docs.lead_paragraph: I refused to wait for the images of slaughter and mass graves before taking action. PRESIDENT OBAMA, in a speech defending the American-led military assault in Libya. [A1]
docs.snippet: I refused to wait for the images of slaughter and mass graves before taking action.     PRESIDENT OBAMA, in a speech defending the American-led military assault in Libya. [A1]...

docs.lead_paragraph: We are beginning to turn the corner. PRESIDENT OBAMA, on the Labor Department's report on jobs. [A1]
docs.snippet: We are beginning to turn the corner.      PRESIDENT OBAMA, on the Labor Department's report on jobs. [A1]...

docs.lead_paragraph: My question to them is: When is the right time? If not now, when? If not us, who? PRESIDENT OBAMA, on those seeking to delay a health care overhaul. [A1]
